> <OLD>
>
> Inside the bridge, Quickstride does as Windlord tells him and w=
ith a swift
hand. He waits for the result but with a tense expression on hi=
s face.
>
> "It's done, let's hope that did something to our advantage."

<=
NEW>

Quickstride=92s work is indeed swift and sure. It takes several tense=
 seconds
. . .

"5 seconds to detonation.=94 The computer intoned as it cou=
nted down.

=934 . . . 3 . . . 2 . . . 1 . . ."

There was a long pause, an=
d then the computer said, =93Unable to achieve
detonation. Detonation seque=
nce terminated.=94

=93You did it!=94 Wing Caliber said with both joy and r=
elief in his voice. =93You
have saved the Ark Quickstride!=94


> <OLD>
>
>=
 Meanwhile, Uproar nodds as he continues to sniff around the parameter of
t=
he area. He could still smell something familliar, and enemy.
>
> "Whoever =
was in this area, is still here, I can smell 'em. They're not too
far off. =
Question is, who and what are we dealing with?"

<NEW>

Uproar and Leo II a=
re both pacing and sniffing their senses on hyper alert.
Who ever it is, th=
ere are skilled at keeping themselves hidden and hiding
their scent. But ev=
en with that there is the faint odor of Predacon or even
Unicronian in the =
air, it is coming from down the hall in the direction from
where they had c=
ome.

> <OLD>
>
> Elita lowered her ears and said "He almost caught me, dad=
... I'm not so
strong... He said that he will come back for me... And I cou=
ldt stop him...
What if he hurts mom trying to caught me... Lord Elder!!!!!=
 He's Hurt, badly
hurt.... Daddy!!! We have to go to help him... HE'S THERE=
!!!" said elita
while the cloack device briefly fall she was able to see it=
 .

<NEW>

Rodimus=92 face went dark as Elita told him about her near captu=
re by the
intruder, his arms holding her firmly as she talked. =93That will=
 never happen
my little one.=94 He said, his voice confident and sure as he=
 spoke.

Rodimus looked in the direction that Elita was pointing but could =
not see
anything since the intruder was still a few halls away and several =
walls
were standing between him and the intruder.

=93LEO, UPROAR!=94 Rodim=
us said, his voice once again full of command. =93Go
retrieve this intruder=
. It is time to have a few words with him.=94 There was
old confidence in R=
odimus=92 voice again as he stood tall and protective over
his young daught=
er. =93Ramulus, go with them. I want him captured!=94



> <OLD>
>
> Percep=
tor tried to cut of the main lead, stop the explosion and save the
ark!!!!!=
!! Then He yellss in pain, what ever Tucson have done, it really
hurted. bu=
t Overcoming the pain contined working and trying to insolate the
Autobots =
and decepticons from the main mess.

<NEW>

As Perceptor worked Legacy also=
 struggled to keep different systems online,
rerouting power from one syste=
m to the next. There were times when they were
successful, but there were a=
lso many other times wHere sparks flew because a
system was either shorted =
out or the fluctuation tripped some sort of
breaker, causing cascading powe=
r failures.

=93Interesting.=94 Legacy intoned as obviously like Perpector =
his acute senses
were being similarly affected by Tuscon=92s barrage. =93Th=
e bridge seems largely
unaffected by Tuscon=92s barrage. It must because it=
 has shielding in place.=94


MEANWHILE OUTSIDE THE ARK:

> <OLD>
>
> Outsi=
de the ark, Tucson holds his position and his wave. A look of sheer
determi=
nation floods his face. He had not answered Kup right away, but
needed not =
to, as his body langauge fortells that of a determined Autobot,
sworn to du=
ty, and prepared to go as much distance as needed. In the midsts
of the wav=
e, he picks up a blip. He detects the intruder inside, and with
that wave, =
pinpoints his location. Yet, he wasn't about to tell anyone what
he'd be up=
 to next. With transmission still underway, he approaches the ark
calmly, w=
ith an alert stride to his walk. The only one who would know what
he'd be u=
p to, would be Legacy.
>
> "Legacy, my sonar systems have picked up the int=
ruder. I know of his
location and I'm very sure I can keep up with him, if =
I continue to
transmit. Can you give me access into the Ark at this time?"
=

<NEW>

=93One moment.=94 Legacy replied over the radio to Tuscon, and then=
 the front
door to the Ark began to slowly slide open. =93You should have c=
omplete access
to the Ark, as does everyone else.=94

As Tuscon moved forwa=
rd though low energy reserve alarm signals began to go
off in Tuson=92s hea=
d. His wounds, his own energy loss over his trip back
finally beginning to =
catch up with him. While his wounds were bound so he
leaked no further ener=
gy, he had yet to get to a recharging chamber, and the
tremendous amounts o=
f energy that he was putting out to maintain his wave
was further depleting=
 his already low energy reserves.



> <OLD>
>
> " Owww.. That wave is real=
ly hurting my relays.. Wait a sec, my radars are
picking up activity all ov=
er the place. We need ta amplify that wave of
yours."
>
> Tucson looks down=
 to her.
>
> "I'm at full power already Straight Shot. Unless of course, Le=
gacy can rig
up an amplifier within the Ark to supplement my sonar attack."=

>
> Straight Shot nodds.
>
> "I'll ask. Legacy, this is Straight Shot, I'm=
 asking a favor on Tucsons
behalf. His waves are strong enough to pick up e=
nemy forces in wide range,
but he wants to take it up a notch and see if he=
 can immobilize them at a
further range. Kind of put them in a stall for no=
w. Can you set up an
amplifier signal to merge with Tucson's sonar system? =
It would be greatly
appreciated."

<NEW>

Legacy=92s cold voice can be hear=
d over Tuscon=92s radio, =93Many of the Ark=92s
systems are also being affe=
cted by the wave you are transmitting. At the
moment Perceptor and I are mi=
nimizing the damage by reallocating power from
down systems to the few that=
 are still running. I have no resources
available to comply with your reque=
st.=94

> <OLD>
>
> Outside the Ark, Night Shift catches something on his r=
adar, and begins to
pick up a little speed, buzzing a bit ahead of Kup, lik=
e a hunting dog
fixated on it's target.
>
> " Hello, I got somethn'! IT'S A=
 PRED SIGNATURE! Ohhh yeah, we're not far
from our targets Kup, I can feel =
'em!"
>
> Rat Trap too, senses them.
>
> "He's right! I got the pred signat=
ure and it's locked'n loaded! Ohhh
Wheels was right! He was right! They're =
still here!"
>
> Rat Trap gets a hold of Rodimus and the others at the Ark.=

>
> "This is Rat Trap ta base! Ya won't believe it, but Wheels was right o=
n
the money this time! They're out here, and I bet they're around the other=

parameters too! Keep your sensors out for 'em, 'cause ya never know what
t=
hose creeps are gonna be up to."
>
> Back at the Ark, outside, Tucson holds=
 for word, but with sonars at full
blast, he picks up activity happening al=
l around the Ark. He narrows his
optics dangerously.
>
> " Ohh, so that's i=
t? Hide and seek... Been there, done that a million
times. Signal's faint, =
but I know you're out there."


OOC: Keep in mind, it was ONLY the intruder=
 inside the Ark who=92s stealth
shielding went down. Blackrazor has an acti=
ve shield that was disrupted by
Tuscon=92s wave. The Sweep=92s stealth is o=
f a different sort and at the moment
is unaffected by it. However that is w=
ater under the bridge with unfolding
events :)

BIC:

As the Maximals creep=
 forward in an attempt to locate the Predacons, Hydras
chooses this moment =
to attack!!

> "ATTACK THE MAXIMALS!!!!!"Hydras yelled "dont touch the ark =
but ATTACK THE
MAXIMALS!!!!"
>

Six sweeps fly into the air, followed by th=
eir leader Scourge! As soon as
they leave the vicinity of Hydras, the Preda=
con leader looses the advantage
of their stealth and immediately begins sho=
wing up on Maximal radar screens!
However the sweeps still maintain their s=
tealth, and only those who can
physically see them are aware of them.

With=
 a viciousness all their own, they begin to open fire on the Maximals!

Tus=
con receives a call from Legacy, =93Tuscon, I am receiving readings of a
si=
ngle Predacon in your area, his IFF signal identifying him as Hydras.=94
Al=
though there was a certain level of urgency in his voice, Legacy was still
=
calm and reserved as he made his tranmission.



Back inside the Ark the in=
truder frowned as he realized that his bomb had
not gone off. With a whispe=
red curse he continued to try to adapt his
stealth shielding to Tuscon=92s =
wave. With a worried look he began to run down
the hall, if he couldn=92t s=
neak out, he would BLAST his way out!

(TAG)

Preston
